LanguageData.rxCollapsedRoofRocks.label: collapsed rocks
LanguageData.rxCollapsedRoofRocks.description: Collapsed rocks, packed tightly enough to hold up a roof.
LanguageData.rxFoamWall.label: hardened foam wall
LanguageData.rxFoamWall.description: Solidified chemical foam. Extremely tough and non-flammable.
LanguageData.rxFoamWallBricks.label: chiseled foam wall
LanguageData.rxFoamWallBricks.description: Solidified chemical foam. Made a bit more presentable by carving a brick pattern into the surface.
LanguageData.rxFoamWallSmooth.label: smooth foam wall
LanguageData.rxFoamWallSmooth.description: Solidified chemical foam. Made a bit more presentable by smoothing the surface.
LanguageData.rxGasVent.label: gas vent
LanguageData.rxGasVent.description: Pushes gasses from one side to the other when powered. Also equalizes heat like a regular vent when powered. Tip: switches can be used to toggle vents remotely, as well as in groups.
LanguageData.rxGasVent.comps.CompUpgrade-0.label: Armor plating
LanguageData.rxGasVent.comps.CompUpgrade-0._effectDes: Effects: Max hit points: x300%, Flammability: x0%
LanguageData.rxGasVent.comps.CompUpgrade-1.label: High-power fans
LanguageData.rxGasVent.comps.CompUpgrade-1._effectDes: Effects: Gas venting power: x200%, Power consumption: x200%, Beauty: x10
LanguageData.rxGasVent.comps.CompUpgrade-2.label: Idle power relay
LanguageData.rxGasVent.comps.CompUpgrade-2._effectDes: Effects: The vent will draw very little power when no gas needs to be moved.
LanguageData.rxGasVent.comps.CompUpgrade-2.effectDesc: The vent will draw very little power when no gas needs to be moved.
LanguageData.rxPowerUnit.label: portable power unit
LanguageData.rxPowerUnit.description: High-tech solar panels combined with a battery bank. Lightweight and weatherproof- a great choice for camping trips and powering things in the field. The battery will retain its charge when uninstalled. The bar shows the charge level of the battery.
LanguageData.rxPowerUnit.comps.CompUpgrade-0.label: Bigger battery
LanguageData.rxPowerUnit.comps.CompUpgrade-0._effectD: Effects: Power capacity: x175%, Mass: x150%
LanguageData.rxPowerUnit.comps.CompUpgrade-1.label: Tracking motors
LanguageData.rxPowerUnit.comps.CompUpgrade-1._effectD: Effects: Sun exposure: x200%, Mass: x120%
LanguageData.rxProximitySensor.label: proximity sensor
LanguageData.rxProximitySensor.description: Scans for movement in the surrounding area. On detection, can either sound an alarm, or send a detonation signal. Can be upgraded to a wireless detonator, and even an AI core to ignore friendly units.
LanguageData.rxProximitySensor.comps.CompUpgrade-0._e: Effects: Sensor range: x125%, Sensor angle: x125%, Power consumption: x120%
LanguageData.rxProximitySensor.comps.CompUpgrade-1._e: Effects: Adds a wireless detonator to the detector, allowing it to trigger wireless explosives.
LanguageData.rxProximitySensor.comps.CompUpgrade-1.ef: Adds a wireless detonator to the detector, allowing it to trigger wireless explosives.
LanguageData.rxProximitySensor.comps.CompUpgrade-2._e: Effects: Installs an AI persona core to filter the detected targets. Sensor rotation speed: x125%, Max hit points: x200%, Flammability: x0%
LanguageData.rxProximitySensor.comps.CompUpgrade-2.ef: Installs an AI persona core to filter the detected targets.
LanguageData.rxWallFoamBlob.label: chemical foam
LanguageData.rxWallFoamBlob.description: Becomes tougher than rock as it solidifies.
